rows.EXPERT ADVISOR ONBOARDING PACKET: What an expert receives when asked to review a cluster. This is the recruiting tool for advisors.
PACKET CONTENTS (sent as PDF or Notion link)

rows.col_2: IonWave is a premium electrolyte supplement company being built using a novel coordination protocol. Instead of hiring a traditional team, we're using flash teams of specialized co-founders — each owning a specific business function — supported by AI-assisted production and expert verification. You're being asked to be the expert.
Nilo Vicioso — COO of Tabs ($25M raised, 100M+ organic views/month), partner at an ecommerce venture fund, YC/Greylock/KV-backed founder.

A PM Co-Founder produces a cluster of work (the "TUP"). You review it, grade it, and your expert opinion determines whether it locks or gets returned for revision. Your name goes on the final output permanently.
[Pulled from P-tab — e.g., "CL-3: Product & Supply Chain"]
[Pulled from P-tab — e.g., "Formulation brief, manufacturer sourcing, COGS model, packaging design, quality control plan"]
[Pulled from P-tab — e.g., "12 content tabs across 3 TUPs"]
[Pulled from M0 Downstream — e.g., "Core Formulation, Form Factor, Target COGS"]
10-20 hours over 1-2 weeks. Read the tabs, write review notes per tab, assign a grade.

rows.EXPERT ADVISOR ONBOARDING PACKET: PAGE 3: WHAT DONE LOOKS LIKE (sample V-tab)

rows.col_2: [Sample — e.g., "BCL-3.1: Formulation Brief"]
[Your Name]
[Date]
[B+ — see grading rubric below]

[Example: "C-tab 3.1.2 (Ingredient Sourcing): Strong sourcing analysis for sodium/potassium. Missing: magnesium sourcing alternatives. Current spec assumes single supplier — add backup supplier analysis. Grade for this tab: B."]

rows.EXPERT ADVISOR ONBOARDING PACKET: What would make this an A
rows.col_2: "Include competitive formulation analysis (what exactly is in LMNT vs Liquid IV at the molecular level). Add backup suppliers for each key ingredient. Strengthen the IP/trade secret argument for the specific ratio."

rows.EXPERT ADVISOR ONBOARDING PACKET: What would make this a D
rows.col_2: "No original research. Just restated what Claude drafted without domain expertise. No sourcing contacts. No COGS reality check. Would not be usable by a CEO."
0.1-0.25% per cluster reviewed. Vests upon completion of review.
None. This is an equity-only advisory relationship.
Permanently. "Reviewed by [Your Name], [Date], [Grade]" on every TUP you grade. This is public and part of the show.
Your review session will be recorded as a long-form episode. You're on camera (or audio) giving your real assessment. This is content for your professional brand.
10-20 hours total. One review cycle.
You don't produce anything. You don't manage anyone. You don't attend meetings. You review, grade, and move on.
